character.background: Orphaned at a young age, Eira grew up on the streets of a bustling city, quickly learning to rely only on herself. She honed her skills as a hunter and seeker of rare artifacts, becoming known for her unparalleled accuracy with a bow and her unwavering determination in the face of danger.
character.place-of-birth: The City of Whispers, in the heart of the mystical forest of Elvendom

physical-appearance.hair-color: Raven Black with subtle hints of Auburn under sunlight
